title: LMS-Based Multimedia Design and Cognitive Load Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic LMS (Learning Management System) operation experience and intermediate-level digital literacy
context.additional_context: Focused on strengthening the capacity to improve existing LMS content for corporate education managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and design multimedia elements (text, images, video) within an LMS according to cognitive load theory.
Learners can restructure learning materials by applying the Coherence (removing redundant information) and Contiguity (spatial/temporal proximity) principles.
Learners can improve learner attention by over 20% using segmentation and signaling techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
